ygData.subject: Re: Wizard spells
ygData.msgSnippet: I bought the Root spell right in Erudin Palace. Can t remember which merchant it was, but I don t think it was one in the Crimson Hands tower. I m pretty sure
ygData.messageBody:
I bought the Root spell right in Erudin Palace. Can't
remember which merchant it was, but I don't think it
was one in the Crimson Hands tower. I'm pretty sure it
was that guy right on the main floor that leads to the
3 mage towers... the one that sells mostly generic
spells usuable by all the mage classes.


--- zdogg@... wrote:
> From: zdogg@...
>
> I am on the look out for the Root spell my friends
> of Norrath. I have travel
> far from Erudin in my search yet have been unable to
> locate it. I have gone as
> far a Rivervale looking for this spell of great
> legacy. Does anybody know of
> its whereabouts? It would be greatly appreciated if
> any creature could let me
> know.
>
> Zakrul the Traveler
> Companion
> Erudite Wizard
>
>
